Sentencas: Due to its high surface area and catalytic activity, the nanostructure of platinum significantly enhances the electrochemical reactions of electrodes.
Titulo: Enhanced Thermal Stability of Ultrathin Nanostructured Pt cathode by PdO: In Situ Nanodecoration for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: However, the inherently poor thermomechanical stability of the nanostructure has been a critical issue.
Titulo: Enhanced Thermal Stability of Ultrathin Nanostructured Pt cathode by PdO: In Situ Nanodecoration for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: This study suggests a simple method of using a Pd layer deposited by sputtering to enhance the stability of the 20 nm thick nanoporous Pt.
Titulo: Enhanced Thermal Stability of Ultrathin Nanostructured Pt cathode by PdO: In Situ Nanodecoration for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: The microstructural analysis reveals that the Pd films are partially oxidized at operating temperature to nano-polycrystalline Pd formed around Pt particles and inhibiting the mobility of the Pt grains.
Titulo: Enhanced Thermal Stability of Ultrathin Nanostructured Pt cathode by PdO: In Situ Nanodecoration for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell

Sentencas: By preserving the Pt nanostructure, the degradation rate of the Pt-Pd cathode structure is 10 times lower than that of the Pt cathode.
Titulo: Enhanced Thermal Stability of Ultrathin Nanostructured Pt cathode by PdO: In Situ Nanodecoration for Low-Temperature Solid Oxide Fuel Cell
